text: Ðis synd ða landgemæra ðe Eadweard cyng gebocade Wulfwold abbade into æscwica.
Ðæt is, ærest up of Netelforda up an Nætelingeweg.
Of Nætelingewege andlang weges on ðæt lepegeat.
Of ðam lepegeate on ða hara stanas to Leofesices suðcroftes heornan.
Of Leofesices suðcroftes heornan niðor on ðone plægstede.
And of ðan plægstede niðor on ðæt bydeland.
Of ðan bydeland niðor ofer hylda on smedbroc.
And of smedesbrocan andlang brocas on mylnecumbes stræm.
And butan ðam twelf æceras mæde ðe licgað on suðhealf weges into ðam þreom worðigan his orfe to læsse.
